name: MobiMiners Alpha Release
description:
The aim of the game in MobiMiners is to explore and locate various minerals which you can gather and then sell at a static landmark. It is a turn-based game in which you compete against 1 - 3 other player(s) to be the first to earn enough coins to purchase the winner’s crown. 

The simple core to the game involves you moving around the world on a hexagonal grid and the variety in gameplay comes from the ability to sabotage other players or out-perform them using items you find in the world or special abilities accessed at the expense of unique minerals.
